price: 26. Arrinkani waxaa ugu sugan cibrad (digniin) qof kastoo ka baqa Alle.
arabic: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَعِبۡرَةٗ لِّمَن يَخۡشَىٰٓ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: inna fī dhālika laʿib'ratan liman yakhshā
